|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4322; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM SerComm (YNF10A-1.6) Per the manual, the default SSID for the a/n radio is '''NETGEAR-DualBand-N''' and the 11g radio is '''NETGEAR-2.4-G'''. There is a v2 of this model (which s08/06/2010hares the same FCC ID).
The support page for the v2 unit is [http://support.netgear.com/app/products/model/a_id/12063 here]. :E0:91:F5 OUI on the v2 ::FCC ID PY308400100 (not granted) apparently covered the v2 ==Links of Interest== [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=30023 On the OpenWrt forums] [[Category:English Documentation]]
